QuestData.Title: The Elusive Ironjaw
QuestData.Description: Now that I have the fur I'll need for the trim, I've been thinking that the pelt of a particular wolf would make a good hood for my cloak. Imagine seeing your enemy clad in the pelt of the most cunning predator in the forest!$B$BI've tried trapping old Ironjaw without success. I've tried cornering him, outsmarting him, and baiting him. None of it has worked.$B$BHe stalks the northeastern reaches of the forest, and I'd gladly reward you if you could succeed where I have failed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Ironjaw's Pelt to Bertelm at the Allerian Stronghold.
QuestData.CompletionText: Has old Ironjaw gotten the better of you, too, friend? Or have you managed to outsmart the old fellow?
QuestData.RewardText: I bow to your skills, $n. You have proven yourself the superior hunter.$B$BI won't forget your help in making this cloak. It will truly be a one-of-a-kind piece and I'll wear it proudly.
